Uses of Interface
com.hazelcast.transaction.TransactionalTaskContext

  • Packages that use TransactionalTaskContext 
    Package Description
    com.hazelcast.client.proxy.txn
    Contains classes related to proxy for client transactions
    com.hazelcast.client.proxy.txn.xa
    Contains classes related to proxy for XA
    com.hazelcast.client.spi
    Contains classes/interfaces related to the Hazelcast client Service Provider Interface.
    com.hazelcast.spring.transaction
    Contains Hazelcast transaction classes for Spring Transaction API.
    com.hazelcast.transaction
    Provides interfaces/classes for Hazelcast transaction support.
    com.hazelcast.transaction.impl.xa
    Provides implementation for Hazelcast XA transaction support.

    • Uses of TransactionalTaskContext in com.hazelcast.client.proxy.txn

      Classes in com.hazelcast.client.proxy.txn that implement TransactionalTaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TransactionContextProxy
      Provides a context to perform transactional operations: beginning/committing transactions, but also retrieving transactional data-structures like the TransactionalMap.

    • Uses of TransactionalTaskContext in com.hazelcast.client.proxy.txn.xa

      Classes in com.hazelcast.client.proxy.txn.xa that implement TransactionalTaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XATransactionContextProxy
      Provides a context to perform transactional operations: beginning/committing transactions, but also retrieving transactional data-structures like the TransactionalMap.

    • Uses of TransactionalTaskContext in com.hazelcast.client.spi

      Subinterfaces of TransactionalTaskContext in com.hazelcast.client.spi 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ClientTransactionContext
      Provides a context to perform transactional operations: beginning/committing transactions, but also retrieving transactional data-structures like the TransactionalMap.

    • Uses of TransactionalTaskContext in com.hazelcast.spring.transaction

      Classes in com.hazelcast.spring.transaction that implement TransactionalTaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ManagedTransactionalTaskContext
      TransactionalTaskContext proxying implementation to make the one created by HazelcastTransactionManager available to actual business logic.

    • Uses of TransactionalTaskContext in com.hazelcast.transaction

      Subinterfaces of TransactionalTaskContext in com.hazelcast.transaction 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TransactionContext
      Provides a context to perform transactional operations: beginning/committing transactions, but also retrieving transactional data-structures like the TransactionalMap.
      Methods in com.hazelcast.transaction with parameters of type TransactionalTaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T TransactionalTask.execute(TransactionalTaskContext context)
      Executes the transactional logic.
